Columns.Description: The time (UTC) at which this event was generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The name of this operation
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The client request id
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The name of the database
Columns.Name: DatabaseName

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: TableName

Columns.Description: The total size of extents (compressed size + index size) in the table (in bytes)
Columns.Name: TotalExtentSize

Columns.Description: The total original size of data in the table (in bytes)
Columns.Name: TotalOriginalSize

Columns.Description: The total size of extents (compressed size + index size) in the table, stored in the hot cache (in bytes)
Columns.Name: HotExtentSize

Columns.Description: Retention policy origin entity (Table/Database/Cluster)
Columns.Name: RetentionPolicyOrigin

Columns.Description: The table's effective entity retention policy, serialized as JSON
Columns.Name: RetentionPolicy

Columns.Description: Caching policy origin entity (Table/Database/Cluster)
Columns.Name: CachingPolicyOrigin

Columns.Description: The table's effective entity caching policy, serialized as JSON
Columns.Name: CachingPolicy

Columns.Description: The maximum creation time of an extent in the table (or null, if there are no extents)
Columns.Name: MaxExtentsCreationTime

Columns.Description: The minimum creation time of an extent in the table (or null, if there are no extents)
Columns.Name: MinExtentsCreationTime

Columns.Description: The total number of extents in the table
Columns.Name: TotalExtentCount

Columns.Description: The total number of rows in the table
Columns.Name: TotalRowCount

Columns.Description: The total number of extents in the table, stored in the hot cache
Columns.Name: HotExtentCount

Columns.Description: The total original size of data in the table, stored in the hot cache (in bytes)
Columns.Name: HotOriginalSize

Columns.Description: The total number of rows in the table, stored in the hot cache
Columns.Name: HotRowCount

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
